Just a few reminders for Heritrix users:

There's a page where organizations/people/projects using Heritrix can 
list themselves. It's always nice to know who's using the software, and 
let others considering its use know the size of the community. So if you 
can go 'on record' about your use of Heritrix, please add yourself here:

https://webarchive.jira.com/wiki/display/Heritrix/Users+of+Heritrix

Also, our issue-tracking system allows voting on open unresolved issues. 
Here's the current list of 'popular' issues:

https://webarchive.jira.com/browse/HER#selectedTab=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.project%3Apopularissues-panel

Looking at the 'Roadmap' view shows what issues we're aiming to fix as 
of potential upcoming releases -- though note that issues can move 
around a lot as releases come into closer focus:

https://webarchive.jira.com/browse/HER#selectedTab=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.project%3Aroadmap-panel

- Gordon @ IA
